Disable Boundaries [Mewtality]:

30000000 1068A730

04120000 00000044

10120000 00000044
140F0100 00000000
C1000000 0E297684
D0000000 DEADCAFE
0D000000 1001480C


Prevent Lakitu from grabbing local players off-stage.

Info:
Line 33 and 34 is where the address for this code's variables is store. (Default: 1001480C)
 ⚠ If this address is changed, don't forget to change the undo codeline (Line 12) to the same address.

Game Version: 4.2
TCP Gecko Version: 2.53

Modes Supported:
 • Battle (Offline / Online)
 • Grand Prix
 • Time Trials
 • VS Race (Offline / Online)

Default Data Used:
0x1001480C (4 bytes)

Source:
https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
